compilationResult.description: The compilation result of the source code

log.description: Compiler log, including warnings and errors. Show this to end-users

error.description: Internal error message. Should not be visible to end-users. Present only when an internal error (ex. required compiler is not installed) happens

result.description: Judge response for the test case

exceed.description: The limit that the program exceeded. Present only when the program has exceeded one limit

time.description: CPU time used by the program, in seconds. Present only when "exceed" is missing

memory.description: Peak memory used by the program, in bytes. Present only when "exceed" is missing

exitcode.description: Exit code of the program. Present only when the program exits normally

termsig.description: Signal number that terminates the program. Present only when the program has not exceeded any limit and has exited abnormally (is signaled)

error.description: Internal error message. Present only when "result" is "INTERNAL_ERROR". Should not be visible to end-users

stdout.description: stdout output of the program. Present only when the command line option "--keep-stdout" is set

stderr.description: stderr output of the program. Present only when the command line option "--keep-stderr" is set

checkerOutput.description: Custom checker output (stdout). Present only when custom checker is used and it writes something to stdout

compilation.description: Compilation result of the user code

checkerCompilation.description: Compilation result of the custom checker code. Present only when the command line option "--checker-code" is provided

testcases.description: Test case results. Present only when compilation has successed
